data.message: Implement promotion feeder in duro_validate_decision: Added ~25 lines to duro_mcp_server.py that calls record_observation() when decisions are validated. Signals: user_endorsed=True always, prevented_failure=True if tags include reliability/incident/fix/postmortem/security/bug. Creates PREFERENCE_TO_LAW promotion candidates. Non-blocking (wrapped in try/except). Requires MCP restart to activate.
data.outcome: Added ~25 lines to duro_mcp_server.py that calls record_observation() when decisions are validated. Signals: user_endorsed=True always, prevented_failure=True if tags include reliability/incident/fix/postmortem/security/bug. Creates PREFERENCE_TO_LAW promotion candidates. Non-blocking (wrapped in try/except). Requires MCP restart to activate.
